name: incompetently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone does not have the ability to do something as it should be done: The exam was incompetently designed and administered. He managed the department so incompetently that he was let go. See
incompetent
More examplesFewer examplesThe school reorganization was conducted incompetently from the start.She was treated incompetently by local doctors.The roof was incompetently repaired and continues to leak.
